'''Felix Felicium''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|A Job Well Done}}.

==Trivia==
* This item is a reference to [https://harrypotter.fandom.com/wiki/Felix_Felicis Felix Felicis], a luck potion in the ''Harry Potter'' franchise.
